StartupProgram.cs 1234567891011121314151617public static IWebHostBuilder CreateWebHostBuilder(string[] args) => WebHost.CreateDefaultBuilder(args) .UseSerilog((ctx, config) =>{ config .MinimumLevel.Information() .Enrich.FromLogContext(); if (ctx.HostingEnvironment.IsDevelopment()) { config.WriteTo.Console(); } else { config.WriteTo.Console(new ElasticsearchJsonFormatter()); }}) 参考writing-logs-to-elasticsearch-with-fluentd-using-serilog-in-asp-net-core
